title: The Great British Bake Off needs to change – this series was too cruel, too obscure and blandly millennial
text:
At least we had a surprise result and some late drama in Tuesday night’s grand final of The Great British Bake Off. Unfortunately, it felt like a token cherry on top of a soggy-bottomed cake. This milestone 10th contest hasn’t been a been a vintage one.

The ratings may have stayed buoyant, hovering around 9 million per week, but the social media metrics have been down, which indicates that the show is being less talked about. When it has been discussed online or around those fabled office water-coolers, it hasn’t been in glowingly celebratory terms. So what has gone awry with our favourite sweet-toothed televisual treat?

Grumblings of discontent began in August, as soon as this year’s bakers...
description: At least we had a surprise result and some late drama in Tuesday night’s grand final of The Great British Bake Off.
